Translations.Text: Khiau
Asmekti ueunu n Mass ik, i umdan iS Zakarya
mi iger, i Mass is, ti$oi tabavnit
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, oeent laavam iw, aqeoou ioeq si ccib. A Mass iw! Anuju $uoeK uroin iyi isnu$ben
Nek ugade$ llzem iw, deffir i. Tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot. Efk iyi d lfeox s$uoeK
ad iyi iwoet, ad iwoet si twacult n Yaaqub. Err it, a Mass iw, d win iouvan
A Zakarya, s tidep, Nbecceo ik s uqcic, ism is Yeeya. Ur Nefki, i yiwen, ism agi, uqbel is
Inna: "a Mass iw! Amek ara sau$ aqcic, tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot, u nek $emqe$ di tewser
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass ik: ayagi ishel fellI. Ni$ Xelqe$ k, zik, ur telliv d acemma
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi d assekni". Inna: "assekni ik, ur tepmeslayev i medden, krav wavan, ur tuvnev
Iffe$ ed ar ugdud is, si lemqam. Iweeea yasen ad anzen uubee, tameddit
A Yeeya, eiief Tazmamt, s loehd". D uuebyan, Nefka yas uuwab
lmaenana akked uufawa, s$uone£. Ipeezzib
ibedd i imawlan is; ur illi d aqehhao ne$ d amaaui
Tifrat fellas asmi d ilul, asmi ara immet, asmi ara d iu$al d amuddir
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Meryem, asmi taazel iman is, si twacult is, di tama ugmuv
Terra ssteo garas yidsen. Nuzen as d ooue nne£. £uoes, amzun d amdan ifuqen
Tenna: "ad iyi Eerz Uenin, segk, ma tepeezzibev
Inna: "nek, d amersul kan n Mass im, ad am fke$ aqcic iufan
Tenna: "amek ara sau$ aqcic, ur iyi innul umdan, ur lli$ d tazennant
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass im: ayagi, ishel fellI. A t Nerr d assekni i medden, d aeunu s$uone£. D lameo ippueeppmen
Tebbwi tadist; syis taazel iman is, di tama ibaaden
Bdan p id inzikmiren ar loedra n tezdayt. Tenna: "anna$ lemmer mmute$, uqbel ayagi, ad pwappu$ akw
Issawel as d, seddaw as: "kkes a$wbel, ih, Mass im Irra i$eeo, seddaw am
Hucc, ar $uoem, loedra n tezdayt, ad am d i$li ppmeo amaynut ibwan
Ecc, ssew, ssefoee ieoi m. Ma twalav yiwen n umdan, ini as: nek, s tidep, ueame$ i Uenin, ur pmeslaye$, assa, i umdan
Toue yis ar ugdud is, tebbwi t. Nnan: "a Meryem! Ni$ tusiv d, s temsalt ihejjnen
A ultmas n Haoun, ur illi baba m d argaz ucmit, ur telli imma m d tazennant
Teswaad $uoes. Nnan: "amek ara nemmeslay i uuebyan di ddue
Inna: "nek d amdan n Oebbi. Ifka yi d Tazmamt. Irra yi d nnbi
Ioqa yi anda lli$. Iweuua yi taeallit, u zzakat, skud mazal iyi d amuddir
Ad bedde$ i yimma. Ur iyi Irri d aqehhao, ne$ d ccaqi
Tifrat felli asmi d lule$, asmi ara mmte$, asmi ara d u$ale$ d amuddir
D wagi ay d Aisa, mmi s n Meryem. D awal n tidep, i$ef cukken
Ur iuwib ara, i Oebbi, ad Isau kra n mmi S. Gedha syiS! Ma Iseyya lameo, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw, d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP. D wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, mara walin ass abarar
Ara slen, ara walin, ass ideg ara d asen $uone£! Maca, imednas, assa, di ttelfan s uuee
Nabi ten, $ef ass n ssixia, mara iuao lameo. Nitni, di l$eflan, nitni ur uminen
Ih, d Nekwni, ara Iweoten tamurt akked wayen illan fellas. £uone£ tu$alin nnsen
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Iboahim. Ih, Neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Mi inna i baba s: "a baba! Acimi taabdev win ur nsell, ur nepwali, ur k ip$itin s wacemma
Ih, a baba, Nek ippunefk iyi d, si tmusni, ayen ur ak neppunefk. Ihi ddu yidi, a k nhu$ ar ubrid ilhan
A baba! Ur aabbed Cciian. Ni$ Cciian illa d amaauu i Uenin
A baba! Nek, ugade$ a k iwwet uaaqeb n Uenin, a ppiliv d ameddakwel n Cciian
Inna d: "day tugiv kecc, a Iboahim, ioebbiten iw? Ma ur tfukkev ara, war ccekk, a k oeome$! Iixxeo iyi tallit $wezzifen
Inna: "ili di tifrat. Ad ssutre$ i Mass iw, ad ak Isemmee. Neppa, s tidep, Iauzz iyi
Ad aazle$ iman iw segwen, akked wayen tepnujum, war Oebbi. Ad naaoe$ Mass iw, ahat, s unuju w, ar Mass iw, ur $webne$ ara
Mi iaazel iman is segsen akked wayen aabden, war Oebbi, Nefka yas Iseaq akked Yaaqub. Yal yiwen, Nerra t d nnbi
Nefka yasen seg ueunu nne£. Nerna yasen ccekoan umain, lfayeq
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Musa. Ih, neppa, illa d aaeovi, d amazan, d nnbi
Nessawel as d, si iieof ayeffus n udrar. Nessqeob it id, ad as Nmel
Nefka yas, seg ueunu nne£, gma s, Haoun, d nnbi
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Ismaail. Ih, neppa, illa d win ippaiafen di lemaahda s, d amazan, d nnbi
Iumeo i twacult is, taeallit, zzakat. Iouva t Mass is
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Idris. Ih, neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Nessuli t s amkan aalayen
D wigi i I$at Oebbi, ger lambiyya, ger tarwa n Adem, ger wid i Nebbwi akked Nue, ger tarwa n Iboahim, akked Isoail, ger wid Nenha u Nefren. Ma $oan asen issekniyen n Uenin, ad $lin knan, s imeiiawen
Lxwelf nnsen d asatu i iooan taeallit, ddan d ccehwiyyat. Ad magren ttelfan
Kkes ed wid isteooaen, iumnen, xeddmen ayen ilhan. Wigi, ad kecmen Loennet, ur pwadensen s wacemma
Leonanat n Aaden i Iwaaaed Uenin, i imdanen iS, di tbavnit. Lemaahda S, s tidep, a ppevou
Ur sellen, degs, i yir awal, siwa: "tifrat"! Dinna, lqut nnsen, uubee, tameddit
D tagi ay d Loennet, ara Nerr d lweot, i wid ipeezziben, seg imdanen nne£
Ur d nepuubbu, siwa ma s lameo n Mass ik. IneS i illan zdat nne$, i illan deffir nne$, akked wayen illan garasen. Mass ik ur Iteppu
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ihi, aabed iT, ili d imezgi deg uabad iS. Day tesnev win isaan ism iS
La iqqao umdan: "ma mmute$, day a yi d ssuff$en d amuddir
Day ur icfa ara umdan, ar t id Nxelq, zik, ur illi d acemma
S Mass ik, ara ten Nefser, nitni akked cwaien. Sinna, a ten Nerr ad zzin i Loahennama, $ef tgwecrar
Sinna, a d Nekkes, si yal arbaa, wid ibe$wven nezzeh, ar Uenin
Sinna, d Nekwni, war ccekk, i Isnen sennig akw, imenza ar tmeo$iwt
Akken tellam, a pqeobem $uoes. Akka, ar Mass ik, d aseyyi imueeppmen
Sinna, a Nsellek wid ipeezziben. A Neoo degs, imednas, $ef tgwecrar
Mara asen $oen issekniyen iberrzen nne£, qqaoen wid ijehlen i wid iumnen: "menyif sin irebbuyaa di temaict akw i lemwansa
Aceal isuta i Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen, ifen ten tarkunt, uuifa
Ini: "ad Irnu Uenin di laameo, i im$eooqen, alamma walan acu i sen ippuwaaaden: d aaaqeb ne$ d imir. Ad eoen anwa illan deg umkan adiran mavi, ay d bu laaskeo uohifen mavi
Ad Irnu Oebbi nnhaya i wid ipwanhan. Ar Mass ik, leulae idumen ifen akafi, asisi
Ma twalav win iugin issekniyen nne£, u inna: "tarkunt, tarwa ad iyi ppunefkent, war ccekk
Aani issen tabavnit, ne$ iu$ lemaahda s$uo Uenin
Xaii, a Naru ayen inna. Ad as Nessi$wzef nezzeh aaaqeb
A Newoet ay d inna, a d ias $uone£, d aweid
Xtaoen, war Oebbi, ioebbiten ar asen d iawin tazmert
Xaii! Ad nekoen aabad nnsen, ad asen u$alen d ixuimen
Ur twalav ara, Nuzen ed ccwaien i ijehliyen, la ten laajen s ljuo
Ur peiri fellasen, la Nessalay kan leesab nnsen
Ass ideg ara Nefser wid ipeezziben ar Uenin, d imaaoaven
a Nenheo ijehliyen, d aqwvao, ar Loahennama
Ur sain ccafuaa, siwa win iu$en lemaahda ar Uenin
Nnan: "Isaa Uenin, aqcic
Ni$ tebbwim d abeaauq
Segs, qoib flan igenwan, tcerreg tmurt, grurjen idurar s edie
Gren aS mmi S, i Uenin
Ur iwjib ara, i Uenin, ad Isau mmi S
Akken llan di tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ay d iteddun, ar Uenin, s waabad
Ih, Ieseb iten, Issen nezzeh amvan nnsen
Akw a d asen $uoeS, ass n tnekra, yiwen yiwen
War ccekk, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Iauzz Uenin
Nerra t kan d ushil, s tmeslayt ik, iwakken a pbeccoev, syis, wid ieezzben, u a pnedoev agdud iggernenn
Aceal isuta ay Nesqucc uqbel nnsen! Day a pmagrev yiwen degsen, ne$ a ppeslev i uswecwec nnsen
